name: Super Mario 63 Redux [Tiny Demo]
description:
Note, due to some camera issues, some jittering effects may occur in certain parts of the game. Discretion is advised.

Welcome to Super Mario 63 Redux!

This is the Tiny Demo, consisting of the title screen, main menu, and Tutorial 1. To help us improve the game, we encourage you to report bugs and issues using the F1 menu, as this sends the data directly to the team. Feel free to use this for things you like about the game, too! It helps to know what we're doing right as well as what we're doing wrong.

You can join the Discord server here: https://discord.gg/ctkyscUSBA
...and follow us on Twitter here! https://twitter.com/63Redux

Controls:
  • Arrow keys - Movement
  • Z - Interact, ground pound
  • X - Spin
  • C - Use FLUDD
  • P - Pause game
  • F1 / Top left button on mobile - Open feedback menu
Controls that currently don't work on mobile:
  • T - Show/hide timer
  • A - Reset
  • N - Mute music
  • M - Mute SFX
  • = - Zoom in
  • - - Zoom out

Note: There are some audio issues on the Web version, and overall stability is best on the Windows version.

v0.1.3
